item.title: Gumroad
item.description: Hugo Shortcode for Gumroad # Sell your products with Gumroad buttons and overlays. Read more in Gumroad Help. Minimal example # Here is a simple embedded button for Gumroad good: Get on Code: {{< gumroad-button id="demo" >}}Get on{{</ gumroad-button >}} Full example # Get with 10% discount on Code: {{< gumroad-button id="demo" affiliate="12345678" >}}Get with 10% discount on{{</ gumroad-button >}} Parameters # Parameter Default Description id â€” ID of your good.
